name: Stream.Event
desc: Describes the constants that may be sent to the delegate as a bit field in the second parameter of stream(_:handle:) to specify the kind of stream event.

items.name: static var hasBytesAvailable: Stream.Event
items.desc: The stream has bytes to be read.

items.name: static var hasSpaceAvailable: Stream.Event
items.desc: The stream can accept bytes for writing.

items.name: static var errorOccurred: Stream.Event
items.desc: An error has occurred on the stream.

items.name: static var endEncountered: Stream.Event
items.desc: The end of the stream has been reached.
